lines.text: Something else my grandfather told me. What a true apache had to do, when surrounded, and out-numbered by crazy white men.
You're not dirty enough. You're not crazy enough.
I'm getting really fucking tired of hearing you say that.
Yeah? Well being tired is a lot better than being dead, man.
He saved Sid's life. Can you even tell the difference anymore?
Shut up! Don't say anything, don't do anything, just fucking sit there!

[after Dan has foiled the gang's convenience store robbery]
You just stepped on your meat, man.

[to Dan]
You can't tell the knife from the fuckin' wound anymore.

[to Dan]
Sid, you're either the dumbest fucker I ever met in my life, or you got the balls of an elephant.

[as Dan is confronting Oatmeal]
You hit him and I'll blow your mother-fuckin' brains out.
Boobody lives forever. That's a fact.

[to his turtle]
Good morning, Harold. You still alive?
